name: Realign
description:
Once every 1000 years the planets align in an event known as the great
convergence. It is seen as an extraordinary event meant to be
celebrated by all, even though the true power of the great convergence
has long been lost on mankind. That is until the evil sorcerer, Gib
Tenalp, stumbled upon ancient texts which foretold of a way to harness
the power of convergence for oneself. He uses his new power to bend
the rules of the universe in his favor.

The great wizard Niarb Yxalag had set out to stop him but failed
miserably. Now you, our brave hero, must set out armed with nothing
but your wit and trusty gun to stop the evil sorcerer and his minions, all
while dealing with the constantly changing laws of reality.

You must bring balance back to the universe.
